ratings.comment: I actually had him at IU Bloomington for Italian 101. He was one of my favorite teachers ever and my whole class loved him! I retained more information in one semester of ital than 3 years of hs french. great guy, highly recommend!
Best prof at University of toronto! Take a class with him if you can, so  intelligent and funny
Amazing professor! I look forward 2 this class every time & don't want 2 leave. so much energy & passion. so hot too lol
best italian prof at u of t! take the creative writing class with him, he will open your mind and make you love reading. ti amo Marco!!!!
I absolutely adore Marco. His teaching style is so cool and I never knew university profs could be so good looking.
Marco Lettieri made the course stimulating, fun, and most importantly - an atmosphere where I learned a lot! He is an amazing, very talented young professor. Love love love love
Amazing prof! So clear and funny. & I cant take my eyes off him..
I miss seeing you in Arizona! You were the best! Come baccckkkkkk!

Literally he was the only reason I attended class. He made everything so easy and clear. Marco was more of a friend than a teacher to his students and everyone enjoyed his class all the better for it.
Marco is awesome! I loved his teaching style and he is such a fun guy. I learned a lot and enjoyed going to class!
Marco is a fun person and easy to get along with. He will make sure you understand the language well. If possible, get him as a TA!

If you are taking Italian, there is nobody else better to have for a teacher. Marco is seriously so nice, fun, and helpful. He is the best TA I've ever had. Plus, he is extremely easy to look at...it's one of the reasons I made it to class everyday :)
